name: ancient-postgresql
description: Tracking, subscribing and restricted queries language for PostgreSQL.

scripts.test: npm run pg-start && npm run _test -- --timeout 10000 && npm run pg-stop
scripts.dev-test: (rm -rf .dev && git clone -b dev https://github.com/AncientSouls/AncientSouls.github.io.git .dev && cd .dev && git submodule init && git submodule update && npm run dev-install) && npm link ./ && (cd .dev && npm run dev-use-links && npm run dev-check)
scripts.pg-start: docker pull postgres && docker run --name postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -d -p 5432:5432 postgres
scripts.pg-stop: docker stop postgres && docker rm postgres
scripts.pg-terminal: docker run -it --rm --link postgres:postgres postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres
